DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess ex vivo wettability of a commonly prescribed silicone hydrogel (SiH) contact lens with three marketed contact lens care solutions.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Silicone Hydrogel Lens Wettability With Marketed Lens Care Solutions
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age Soft contact lens wear on a daily wear basis Able to wear lenses at least 8 hours Generally healthy with normal ocular health Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply Use of additional lens cleaners Known sensitivities to any ingredient in any of the study products History of ocular surgery/trauma within the last 6 months Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
